body: Two towering New York figures are at odds in public in the prelude to the Republican presidential primary season. Fox News Chairman Roger Ailes is used to having major Republican politicians show deference to his channel but billionaire entrepreneur Donald Trump shows deference to pretty much no one, and that's scrambled the equation.
description: Two towering New York figures are at odds in public in the prelude to the Republican presidential primary season. Fox News Chairman Roger Ailes is used to having major Republican politicians show deference to his channel but billionaire entrepreneur Donald Trump shows deference to pretty much no one, and that's scrambled the equation.
title: Fox News Chairman Roger Ailes Forced To Steady Relationship With Donald Trump
